column1: 作曲 : Tiffany Arbuckle Lee/Jeremy Bose/Matt Bronleewe/Brandon Arbuckle
column8: And tears that still drip sore

column18: I do not want to be afraid
column20: I do not want to die inside just to breathe in
column21: 我不想只是喘息着无力心渐渐死去

column24: Relief exists I find it when
column25: 好像只有当我被生生剖开时
column32: And these scars wouldn't be so hidden
column33: 这些伤痕不应该这样被隐藏

column36: I feel alone here and cold here

column38: Though I don't want to die

column41: 但是唯一麻木我的方法是让我觉得我的心已经死去
